abstract: AT&T says in a lawsuit that its cellphone coverage is misrepresented in a map in a competitor’s commercial.
snippet: AT&T says in a lawsuit that its cellphone coverage is misrepresented in a map in a competitor’s commercial.
lead_paragraph: AT&T, the giant company with $124 billion in annual sales, has filed a federal lawsuit against its rival, Verizon. The issue: coloring, of the sort that you do in kindergarten.

headline.main: AT&T Declares Color War on Verizon
